title.rendered: Electricity Today Magazine Spotlights Great Southwestern Construction’s Approach to EPC

content.rendered:
SEPTEMBER 18, 2019

Magazine SPOTLIGHTS GREAT SOUTHWESTERN CONSTRUCTION’S APPROACH TO EPC

MYR GROUP SUBSIDIARY FEATURED IN ELECTRICITY TODAY ARTICLE, ‘IN THE DRIVER’S SEAT AND AHEAD OF THE CURVE ON EPC PROJECTS’

In its latest edition, Electricity Magazine shines the spotlight on how Great Southwestern Construction, Inc. (GSWC) adapts and evolves with the ever-changing electrical industry. The three-page article explores how the company stays competitive by constantly growing as client needs and market conditions evolve, which includes the use of engineer procure construct (EPC) to deliver successful projects. Read more about how GSWC has developed its training, technical skills, and project management expertise to stay ahead of the curve in the industry by clicking here.
